conclusion: The rod spins with angular speed ω in a perpendicular, uniform magnetic field B.
Each element of length dr located a distance r from the axis O behaves like a small conductor moving with linear speed v = ω r through the field.
The motional emf generated across the element of length dr is dU = B v dr = B (ω r) dr.
Integrate from r = 0 at end a (O is essentially at a) to r = 4L at end b to find U_ab.
U_ab = ∫₀^{4L} B ω r dr = B ω [r²/2]₀^{4L}.
